name: EIUMenu
0:
”Alexa, ask EIU menu what's for lunch at Thomas?”
”Alexa, open EIU menu.”
”Alexa, ask EIU menu what's for dinner today.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: e. i. u. menu
des:
This Alexa skill pulls the menus for a selected or all dining halls from https://www.eiu.edu/dining/dining_menu.php

*Not affiliated with EIU

*Some features may not work as planned, report any issues to rwbryan@eiu.edu
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
